## Data
Turkey's two way trade data between ten important country. The data has been obtained from [www.trademap.org](www.trademap.org) .
The site gives trade statistics for international business development. Gives import or export values and units yeraly
or quarterly.
The countries below choosen:

* Canada
* China
* France
* Germany
* India
* Italy
* Russian
* UK
* USA
* Japan
